label: Equipment
comment: Hardware or software typically marketed by a company other than the original manufacturer.

objectProperties.comment: An identifier of this OEM equipment.
The manufacturer party for this OEM equipment.
The indication of whether or not this OEM equipment has a polling capability.
The measure of the polling rate for this OEM equipment.
A code specifying a type of OEM equipment.

referencedBy.comment: An interface between an OEM (Original Equipment Manufacturer) equipment and this monitoring IOT device.
